text: Ferdi Erenay Kadioglu (, born 7 October 1999) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays as a midfielder or winger for Turkish club Fenerbahçe. ==International career== Kadioglu was born in Netherlands to a Turkish father and a Canadian-born Dutch mother.
